original_text: But as soon as Jeremiah finished telling all the people everything the Lord had commanded him to say, the priests, the prophets and all the people seized him and said, “You must die!
korean_text: 예레미야가 여호와께서 명령하신 말씀을 모든 백성에게 전하기를 마치매 제사장들과 선지자들과 모든 백성이 그를 붙잡고 이르되 네가 반드시 죽어야 하리라

sentences.original_text: But as soon as Jeremiah finished telling
all the people everything the Lord had commanded him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성에게 주님께서 그에게 명령하신 모든 것을

sentences.original_text: to say, the priests, the prophets and all the people seized him
sentences.korean_translation: 말하라고 하자, 제사장들과 선지자들과 모든 백성이 그를 붙잡았다
